articles.title: rstats AOC Leaderboard
articles.description: An Advent of Code Leaderboard for the #rstats community - maintained by Tan Ho.
articles.contents:
Last updated: 2021-12-05 03:11:20
This leaderboard sorts by total number of stars and then by mean time between part one and part two of the puzzles, thereby de-emphasizing the effect of starting the puzzle closer to the midnight EST release time and increase the emphasis on an efficient solution for part two (generally the harder of the two puzzles).
I would have liked to time from the moment you download the input and/or from when you open the puzzle page, but that is unfortunately not tracked.
